answers.answer: You could try birth control pills...i don't know if it will make them any less heavy but they should help regulate your period to the point where you know when they will be.

question: I suffer from serverely painful and heavy periods, I have also noticed the older I'm getting the more irregular they are becoming.I have looked into the injection Provera but unfortunately I have a history of depression although some years ago and many of my family suffer from diabetes, my mum had breast cancer a few years ago, so it seems that this injection is unsuitable for me.So can you please recommend an alternative medication if such a thing exists.
title: How can I stop my periods
